short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Padoru Remain it will tell you how long to get X'mas

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking forward to Christmas?
Looking forward to how long it will be before you can Padoru?
Then download Padoru Remain!
Click on it to know how long until Christmas!
*In 12/1-12/24,There is a chance that Paroru will be triggered,
and the chance of triggering will increase as we get closer to Christmas.
And Padoru will continue from Christmas to New Year's Day
long.zh_CN:
期待圣诞节吗?
期待还有多久可以Padoru吗?
那来下载Padoru Remain吧
点一下就能知道离圣诞节还有多久啰
新更新：12/1-12/24有机率触发Paroru,
且触发机率会随着接近圣诞节而增加
现在Padoru会从圣诞节持续到元旦
long.zh_TW:
期待聖誕節嗎?
期待還有多久可以Padoru嗎?
那來下載Padoru Remain吧
點一下就能知道離聖誕節還有多久囉
新更新：12/1-12/24有機率觸發Paroru,
且觸發機率會隨著接近聖誕節而增加
現在Padoru會從聖誕節持續到元旦
